value.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) in construction
value.excerpt: With the explosion of terms like Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) in construction, AEC Magazine caught up with Senthil Kumar, CTO and head of AI at start-up Slate.ai to discuss how the technology can assist the complexity in the building industry Q: Senthil,

value.title: At Pompeii, A Robot Dog Is Helping Guard And Protect The Ruins
value.excerpt: A quadruped robot named Spot is the latest piece of cutting-edge technology to come into service at Italy’s Archeological Park of Pompeii in a bid to protect the ancient site.

value.title: STEM programs launch at the county library for Robotics Month
value.excerpt: Did you know that April is Robotics Month? Jeff Buydos, from the county library, joined us on the show to share what kind of programs are offered. Kids can learn all about engineering, robotics,

value.title: Education minister praises tech innovations as he meets robots
value.excerpt: Education Minister Prodromos Prodromou highlighted the importance of digital skills on Monday during his visit to the digitally supported learning environment at the pedagogical institute. The minister had the opportunity to meet and interact with humanoid robots NAO and PEPPER and learn about the robotics kits,

value.title: China’s latest brainwave? Controlling space robots using mind power
value.excerpt: A device that can be controlled by a user’s brain has achieved unprecedented accuracy in tests and could be used at the Chinese space station, scientists say.

value.title: Sandia Researcher Starts Muslim Community Robotics Team
value.excerpt: A research scientist at Sandia National Laboratories, who started the nonprofit Itkan Institute of Technology, has formed four student-led robotics teams in North Texas in hopes of encouraging interest in STEM.

value.title: IIT-Mandi to organise Robotics & AI summer camp for school kids
value.excerpt: The Indian Institute of Technology Mandi is organising the summer camp on Robotics and Artificial Intelligence (AI) in collaboration with Himachal Pradesh Kaushal Vikas Nigam (HPKVN), Shimla. This summer camp,

value.title: This Cheetah Robot Taught Itself How to Sprint in a Weird Way
value.excerpt: Researchers got the machine to run nearly 13 feet per second. It ain't graceful, but this powerful technique is preparing robots for the chaos of the world.

value.title: Artificial intelligence and robotics uncover hidden signatures of Parkinson's disease
value.excerpt: A study published today in Nature Communications unveils a new platform for discovering cellular signatures of disease that integrates robotic systems for studying patient cells with artificial intelligence methods for image analysis.

value.title: South Africa to Add Robotics & Coding to School Curriculum
value.excerpt: The Department of Basic Education (DBE) announced that it will be adding robotics and coding to the South African curriculum. According to the annual performance plan 2022/2023 which was released by the department recently,

value.title: Bear Robotics Raises $81M in Series B Funding
value.excerpt: Bear Robotics, a Redwood City, CA-based provider of hospitality robotics and artificial intelligence solutions, raised $81M in Series B funding

value.title: Top AI execs, including Richard Socher, launch AIX Ventures
value.excerpt: Richard Socher, former Salesforce chief scientist, is among the founding partners of AIX Ventures, a new $50 million AI venture fund.

value.title: Skyline Robotics To Deploy The Ozmo Window-Cleaning Robot In New York
value.excerpt: Deep tech robotics and automation company, Skyline Robotics, completes its $6.5M pre-Series A funding round ahead of the planned deployment of the first Ozmo Window-Cleaning Robot in New York City Skyline Robotics,

value.title: Handheld robot uses AI to help first responders stem bleeding
value.excerpt: Researchers at MIT's Lincoln Laboratory have developed a handheld robot that can help minimally trained responders to control severe internal bleeding in victims of traumatic injury, by helping them insert a needle and catheter into a major blood vessel.

value.title: NVIDIA Unleashes Arsenal Of AI Innovation With Hopper GPU, Grace CPU, Interconnect And Robotics Tech
value.excerpt: This year's NVIDIA's GTC keynote was actually a live demo, delivered from the simulated constructs of the metaverse, and the announcements in silicon and AI innovation were more than impressive.

value.title: Live at PACK EXPO East: Tutor Intelligence Rewrites the Rules of Collaborative Robots
value.excerpt: Tutor Intelligence's vision system with hybrid human and artificial intelligence learns tasks without custom programming.

value.title: How this AI predicts extreme local weather events
value.excerpt: As climate change increases the intensity and frequency of extreme weather events, prediction has never been more important.

value.title: AI Robots for the Elderly Mean Well, but Raise Ethical Issues
value.excerpt: AI robots are increasingly being used to supplement care for the elderly, but experts warn they'll never replace human companionship.

value.title: DAOs will never develop above their present state without the help of robots
value.excerpt: DAOs (decentralized autonomous organizations) are already transforming the world by empowering significant groups of individuals to make autonomous choices. These groups are reducing the need for centralized management teams,

value.title: What happened to delivery robots in San Francisco?
value.excerpt: After a number of companies launched delivery robots in 2017, the city has cracked down on the emerging tech, making it difficult to operate on city streets.

value.title: Robotic Assistance Devices Receives Order for AVA Security Robot from a Leading Provider of Portable Security Systems
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence Technology Solutions, Inc., ( OTCPK:AITX), today announced that its wholly-owned subsidiary Robotic Assistance Devices Inc. (RAD) has received an order for an AVA autonomous access control device from a subsidiary of one of RAD’s existing authorized dealers.

value.title: Developing an autonomous robotic platform to improve the quality of sleep
value.excerpt: For World Sleep Day, we speak to Alexander Breuss from the Sensory-Motor Systems Lab about their autonomous robotic sleep platform.

value.title: Handheld surgical robot can help stem fatal blood loss
value.excerpt: After a traumatic accident, there is a small window of time when medical professionals can apply lifesaving treatment to victims with severe internal bleeding. Delivering this type of care is complex,

value.title: Your Chipotle Chips May Soon Be Made By A Robot Named 'Chippy'
value.excerpt: Chipotle announced on Wednesday that it is testing out an alternative way to make its tortilla chips using an AI-powered robot named “Chippy.” The creation of the robot is intended to help businesses run more efficiently and to help employees not have to do mundane tasks.

value.title: The Internet of Beer: Robotics startup taps Bitcoin to deliver automated beverage
value.excerpt: The Smart Tap system was created in 2016 and employs blockchain technology to link the future of draft beer with the future of transactions.

value.title: ElliQ companion robot for aging adults hits market
value.excerpt: ElliQ is designed to alleviate the effects of loneliness or social isolation and connect users to their families and caregivers.
